title: Drift Summary Schema
description: Schema for system-level drift summaries that aggregate signals from multiple agents

loop_id.description: Unique identifier of the loop being analyzed

alignment_score.description: CEO Agent's assessment of alignment with system beliefs (0.0 to 1.0)

belief_alignment_score.description: Historian Agent's assessment of belief alignment (0.0 to 1.0)

health_score.description: CTO Agent's assessment of loop health (0.0 to 1.0)

trust_decay.description: CTO Agent's measurement of trust decay over recent loops (0.0 to 1.0)

recommendation.description: Recommended action to address drift issues

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the drift summary was generated
